courses.description:
Are you interested in using the power of artificial intelligence (AI) to deliver stunning job performance in any writing task, creative activity, brainstorming, or structured thinking? If so, then this ChatGPT course is the perfect fit for you! It might be the tool you needed to take the next step in your career. ChatGPT is bound to become a new essential job skill - just like googling or mastering Microsoft Office. Impress your boss with your AI-improved high efficiency and productivity.


Together, we will uncover the biggest SECRET of ChatGPT, which most users know nothing about. It is what differentiates a beginner and occasional user from a pro. It is called prompt engineering - writing better prompts - to get the most out of your interactions with ChatGPT. Many people say that prompt engineering is actually more art than science. But personally, I believe that prompt engineering can be learned in a structured form. Prompt engineering can be mastered if you know the mindset, principles, best practices, structural patterns, and modifiers. We will cover all of it step-by-step in this course.


Don’t worry - you don’t need to have any background in computer science or a degree in machine learning; we will not lift the blanket and look under the hood of the inner workings. This course is for anyone. In this course, we focus on the hands-on, practical applications of AI. Anyone who can use a chat program can use it.


In this course, we focus on practical applications - not on theory. You can apply what you learn today and profit from the benefits. Throughout the course, you will have the opportunity to put your new-found skills into practice through a series of hands-on exercises and projects.


This course gives inspiration for applications of ChatGPT in day-to-day office work. Throughout the course, you'll have the opportunity to put your new-found knowledge into practice through hands-on exercises and projects. These will allow you to gain practical experience in using ChatGPT and to see firsthand how it can be applied in different settings.


Whether you are a beginner or an avid user of ChatGPT, you will improve your ChatGPT skills with this course:
As a beginner, you are taken by the hand to create your first interaction with the AI, and you will quickly learn the ropes. Get guidance and support every step of the way, ensuring that you have a solid foundation in ChatGPT.
Avid users and beginners alike will profit from gaining hands-on experience using ChatGPT to generate text that is coherent and natural, and you will explore the many possibilities for using this tool in a variety of applications. As an avid user of ChatGPT, you know that the biggest leverage is in writing effective prompts: We give you the most effective patterns and best practices to help you write better prompts. You'll also learn how to evaluate the performance of ChatGPT and how to troubleshoot common issues that may arise. You will have the skills and confidence to use ChatGPT to generate high-quality text in a variety of settings.
By the end of this course, you'll be well-equipped to use ChatGPT effectively in your own projects and to advance your career regardless of what industry you are in. Whether you are a business problem solver, content creator, marketer, or simply curious about the potential of artificial intelligence, this course will give you the knowledge and skills you need to master ChatGPT and make a real impact in your work.
No prior knowledge is required. All you need is an internet connection and curiosity about what ChatGPT can do for you! So don't wait - enroll in the ChatGPT course today and discover the power of this incredible tool!
target_audience: You, if you are curious about ChatGPT - this course shows practical examples you can use today
You, if you want to uncover the biggest SECRET of ChatGPT - Prompt Engineering
You, if you are secretly afraid that AI will take your job - this course shows you how to turn ChatGPT into a powerful assistant so you can excel at your job
You, if you needs to write articles, blogs, copy or just emails as part of your job - this course provides an approach for AI-supported writing
You, if you do any type of technical design or technical creative work
You, if you want to become more productive and impress your boss with your efficiency
You, if you want to free up the repetitive task in your life so you can get back to the things that truly matter

courses.description:
Cypress is an open-source test framework that allows its users to write automated end to end tests in an easy, quick and reliable way (all in JavaScript). Cypress is developers and QA engineers friendly and it’s not based on Selenium! It comes with out of box capabilities to bring Stable Automation results for all Modern Web Apps.
This course begins with much basic and slowly progress towards the advanced concepts of Cypress. In this course Cypress by Examples, we will help you understand complex tasks like, Locating Web Elements Using Xpath, Handling iframes, API Testing, and so on. With the help of practical examples, this course will help you get up and learning with Cypress in no time.
Whether you are starting from scratch or are already familiar with test automation, this course is for you. It’s packed with quick explanatory videos, with no extra fluff but practical stuff. Every lesson gets straight to the point. It’s all code examples, problem solutions and best practices.
Most of the lessons are Cypress challenges, where you can test out knowledge and learn practically. Challenges are staged into different levels and mostly help you experience those amazing "WOW" moments.
target_audience: Automation Engineers
Software Developers
Manual Testers
Software Engineers
QA Engineers, Managers, and Architects

courses.description:
Update for course slide ->> All slides of this course has been updated in pdf format in there respective sections.


This course is designed keeping in mind of providing overall understanding of embedded linux. This course does not cover  advanced topic of linux kernel. In this course, you don't really have to buy any embedded hardware or evaluation board. Here first you will learn about linux  basic concepts which will be applicable for all the linux professional. After the linux basic concepts, we will move towards topics especially designed for embedded linux. In embedded linux specific topics, we will cover qemu, toolchain, bootloader, kernel and root filesystem.
Throughout embedded linux specific topics, we will be taking reference of qemu instead of real target board like RPi or beaglebone black for covering the practical examples.
Best part of this course unlike other courses on udemy is that you don't have to buy costly embedded linux capable hardware/board. We will do all the practical examples like running u-boot, kernel, rootfs on Qemu which is a hardware emulator. Once you will be comfortable with concept of embedded linux, then based on your requirement and budget, you can buy  a perfect embedded linux board. In this course, you will get to know how to select best possible board for you.
*** This course is available in both video and slides. Choose anyone or both which work best for you. ***


*** Please note that this embedded linux course will keep updating to improve the course and meet any specific area of interest within the scope of the course based on students feedback and demand. ***
target_audience: This course is especially designed for those who want to make career in Embedded Linux domain.
This course has been designed keeping in mind of both absolute beginners and Intermediate programmers in embedded linux field.
